name: Retiragon
description: Player was a character in a multiplayer competitive game, he was one of the best, but now his game was cancelled and Player faces the real enemies of hunger, depression and... hygiene. Will he manage to survive in real life? This time there´s no second chances, no respawn, everything is at stake! Farm the woods and the mineral stones for money and if you get 1000 XP, the Chieft had promissed a second chance! Is there still any hope left for them?
